title: Hawaii water infrastructure special fund
context: [ยง155-34] Hawaii water infrastructure special fund. (a) There is established the Hawaii water infrastructure special fund into which shall be deposited: (1) Water infrastructure charges received for the use and services of the loan program, including the repayment of loans made under the loan program; (2) All other funds received by the department and legally available for the purposes of the water infrastructure special fund; (3) Interest earnings on all amounts in the water infrastructure special fund; and (4) Any other moneys permitted by the board of agriculture. (b) Moneys in the water infrastructure special fund may be used for the purposes of: (1) Making water infrastructure loans; (2) Paying administrative costs of the loan program; or (3) Paying any other costs related to the loan program.
